org.platanios.learn.combination.error

Class ErrorRatesEstimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.platanios.learn.classification.reflect.perception.ErrorRatesEstimation

  • public class ErrorRatesEstimation
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the set up of the numerical optimization problem that needs to be solved in order to estimate error rates of several approximations to a single function, by using only the agreement rates of those functions on an unlabeled set of data.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Antonios Platanios

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EstimationData data
      Data structure containing all the data needed for estimating the error rates.
      private OptimizationProblem optimizationProblem
      The wrapper of the solver used for solving the numerical optimization problem involved in the estimation of the error rates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorRatesEstimation(EstimationData data)
      Sets up the optimization problem that needs to be solved for estimating the error rates, using DependencyObjectiveFunction as the objective function we wish to minimize, and initializes the numerical optimization solver that is used to solve it.
      ErrorRatesEstimation(EstimationData data, ObjectiveFunctionType objectiveFunctionType)
      Sets up the optimization problem that needs to be solved for estimating the error rates, using the provided objective function as the objective function we wish to minimize, and initializes the numerical optimization solver that is used to solve it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EstimationData solve()
      Solves the numerical optimization problem and returns the obtained error rates estimates in an EstimationData structure.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • data

        private EstimationData data
        Data structure containing all the data needed for estimating the error rates.

      • optimizationProblem

        private OptimizationProblem optimizationProblem
        The wrapper of the solver used for solving the numerical optimization problem involved in the estimation of the error rates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ErrorRatesEstimation

        public ErrorRatesEstimation(EstimationData data)
        Sets up the optimization problem that needs to be solved for estimating the error rates, using DependencyObjectiveFunction as the objective function we wish to minimize, and initializes the numerical optimization solver that is used to solve it. That solver is currently the KNITRO solver.
        Parameters:
        data - A data structure (EstimationData) which contains all the data required to setup and solve the numerical optimization problem.

      • ErrorRatesEstimation

        public ErrorRatesEstimation(EstimationData data,
                            ObjectiveFunctionType objectiveFunctionType)
        Sets up the optimization problem that needs to be solved for estimating the error rates, using the provided objective function as the objective function we wish to minimize, and initializes the numerical optimization solver that is used to solve it. That solver is currently the KNITRO solver.
        Parameters:
        data - A data structure (EstimationData) which contains all the data required to setup and solve the numerical optimization problem.
        objectiveFunctionType - The type of objective function to minimize (e.g. minimize dependency, scaled dependency, etc.).

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public EstimationData solve()
        Solves the numerical optimization problem and returns the obtained error rates estimates in an EstimationData structure.
        Returns:
        The obtained error rate estimates in an EstimationData structure.
